import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Button } from 'reactstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../styles/thank-you.css' import config from './Khalti/khaltiConfig.js' import KhaltiCheckout from "khalti-checkout-web"; import Booking from '../components/Booking/Booking' let checkout = new KhaltiCheckout(config); let totalAmt = Booking.totalAmount; const ThankYou = () => { return (

Thank You

Your tour is booked.
) } export default ThankYou
